about_the_game: In Stick Mountain, you are a skilled agent hired by the powerful S-Co corporation to eliminate high-risk threats across countless planets. Each world presents deadly challenges, pushing you to master elemental powers, craft advanced weapons, and forge armor from rare materials to survive. Uncover hidden agendas, build alliances, and decide the fate of entire civilizations as you rise to become S-Co’s most formidable operative.
